ess-beta-metadata.label: Population by age and sex
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Percentage of the total population by sex and five-year age band
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage distribution of the total population by sex and fiveâ€‘year age bands, in the United Kingdom, for 1991 to 2024.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats:
Ages 85 and over are combined into a single category.

Population estimates in Explore Local Statistics (ELS) are informed by those available on Nomis at the time of publication on ELS.
